contextId.information: Paul speaks of food as though it were a person who could make God welcome us. AT: "food does not give us favor with God" or "the food we eat does not make God pleased with us" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_personification]])
contextId.quote: food will not present us to God

contextId.information: Here Paul speaks about love as if it were a person. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_personification]])
contextId.quote: Love is patient and kind ... endures all things
